mrbles.data¶

Data Classes and Functions¶

This file stores the data classes and functions for the MRBLEs Analysis module.

Classes

ImageDataFrame([data]) Xarray based dataframe object for images.
ImageSetRead(file_path[, series, output]) Image set data object that loads image set from file(s).
TableDataFrame([data, flag_filt]) Pandas based dataframe object for table data.
